author: sebb
msg: Fix some references to the podling name - was using X rather than XYZ

author: vinodkv
msg: MAPREDUCE-2925. Fixed Yarn+MR client code to behave saner with completed jobs. Contributed by Devaraj K.

author: gstein
msg: Simplify process_actions() by applying the prop changes against the
fetched properties, instead of accumulating changes for later application.
(process_actions): constify a couple locals. as soon as we see a
property change, fetch the original props and apply the change. set
the properties at the end, if we ever saw any prop changes.
